name: Hand Dodger
description:
Using Leap Motion Controller, you have to dodge the obstacles with the rotation of your right hand rotation and use your left hand to activative powers up.

Be careful, some powers up boxes are fake and could confuse you...

CONTROLS : (Leap Motion)

Orientation :

⬅️ : Right hand rotation to the left➡️ Right hand rotation to the right

Powers up :

Jumpraise left handScale downpinch left handDestruct nearby obstaclesclose left handInvincibilitypalm up left hand
